bug.author: brollb
bug.summary: Missing environment.yml file error in CLI
bug.description:
The CLI throws the following error: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4982789/76800402-94ad4380-67a1-11ea-85c8-cb6dc177d426.png></denchmark-link>
This was introduced in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deepforge-dev/deepforge/pull/1519>#1519</denchmark-link> as I was expecting to test it in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deepforge-dev/deepforge/pull/1514>#1514</denchmark-link> and didn't realize it was referenced elsewhere
